00017 package WeBWorK::RPC;
00018 
00019 =head1 NAME
00020 
00021 WeBWorK::RPC - Remote Procedure Calls for WeBWorK.
00022 
00023 =cut
00024 
00025 use strict;
00026 use warnings;
00027 
00028 use Data::Dumper;
00029 use WeBWorK::Authen;
00030 use WeBWorK::Authz;
00031 use WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment;
00032 use WeBWorK::DB;
00033 use WeBWorK::RPC::Request;
00034 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/runtime_use/;
00035 
00036 sub bootstrap {
00037     my ($invocant, %params) = @_;
00038     my $class = ref $invocant || $invocant;
00039     my $self = bless {}, $class;
00040     
00041     my $r = $self->{r} = new WeBWorK::RPC::Request;
00042     
00043     my $ce = eval { new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment(\%WeBWorK::SeedCE) };
00044     $@ and die "Failed to initialize course environment: $@\n";
00045     $r->ce($ce);
00046     
00047     my $authz = new WeBWorK::Authz($r);
00048     $r->authz($authz);
00049     
00050     my $authen_module = WeBWorK::Authen::class($ce, "user_module");
00051     runtime_use $authen_module;
00052     my $authen = $authen_module->new($r);
00053     $r->authen($authen);
00054     
00055     if (defined $ce->{courseName} and $ce->{courseName} ne "") {
00056         my $db = new WeBWorK::DB($ce->{dbLayout});
00057         $r->db($db);
00058     }
00059     
00060     return $self, %params;
00061 }
00062 
00063 sub hi {
00064     print STDERR __PACKAGE__."::hi(@_) called\n";
00065     return "hello, world";
00066 }
00067 
00068 sub bye {
00069     print STDERR __PACKAGE__."::bye(@_) called\n";
00070     return "goodbye, cruel world";
00071 }
00072 
00073 sub dumper {
00074     print STDERR __PACKAGE__."::dumper(@_) called\n";
00075     return Dumper(\@_);
00076 }
00077 
00078 sub get_course_environment {
00079     my ($self, %params) = bootstrap(@_);
00080     return $self->{r}->ce;
00081 }
00082 
00083 ################################################################################
00084 
00085 package WeBWorK::RPC::CourseManagement;
00086 
00087 use WeBWorK::Utils::CourseManagement;
00088 
00089 sub listCourses {
00090     my ($self) = WeBWorK::RPC::bootstrap(@_);
00091     return WeBWorK::Utils::CourseManagement::listCourses($self->{r}->ce);
00092 }
00093 
00094 sub listArchivedCourses {
00095     my ($self) = WeBWorK::RPC::bootstrap(@_);
00096     return WeBWorK::Utils::CourseManagement::listArchivedCourses($self->{r}->ce);
00097 }
00098 
00099 sub addCourse {
00100     my ($self, %options) = WeBWorK::RPC::bootstrap(@_);
00101     die "missing courseID in \%options" unless defined $options{courseID};
00102     $options{ce} = new WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment({
00103         webwork_dir => $self->{r}->ce->{webwork_dir},
00104         courseName => $options{courseID},
00105     });
00106     return WeBWorK::Utils::CourseManagement::addCourse(%options);
00107 }
